Package org.eclipse.gef.rulers

Interface Summary
RulerChangeListener RulerChangeListeners can be added to RulerProviders to receive notification about changes in the ruler/guide properties.
 

Class Summary
RulerChangeListener.Stub Stub for the RulerChangeListener interface.
RulerProvider This class provides an interface to interact with the ruler/guide feature provided in GEF.
